website_summaries.verdict: In spite of a few issues, its features and functions suit most users. A good choice for those who want a decent tablet for a reasonable price.
pros: 16GB storage and 1.2GHz processing speed in a streamlined, portable 8-in
Decent resolution considering the reasonable price
cons: Pre-installed software consumes lots of space
Sound doesn't compare to video quality
Occasional problems with random updates causing overheating or slowing down

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight, easy to hold.
customer_reviews.text: I am 100% satisfied with my new tablet. Received it on time. I highly recommend. It is very light and super easy to use. This is the best size for casual surfing. I have a laptop, I just needed something to keep handy. It has Microsoft office installed, so you can use as a laptop if you don't have one.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Its a samsung. So it's great.
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing. Very fast, very reliable. Always go with Samsung. This thing has great quality for watching movies. Definitely would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for the bargain price
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works just as described. The screen size is just right...not too big and not too small. Quite light to hold on your hand and batter lasts forever. Good screen brightness and a decent tablet for basic use. Not a high end tablet, but it gets the job done. Camera quality is pretty bad, but who really buys a tablet to take pictures? Overall great tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel M. Tomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Has been a fun little tablet and does exactly as I wanted. Works just like my phone so I don't have to relearn it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my tablet!!! Best decision ever and way cheaper than a Apple. Works just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Tegan

customer_reviews.title: Love this tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet. I do not have one bad thing to say about it. I had an Asus before this and it was nice but I really like the galaxy. It is very thin and easy to handle. The speed of downloads is great.
customer_reviews.author: PD MO

customer_reviews.title: My Dad Loves It
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my dad for Christmas for his old unbranded cheap tablet is crapping out on him. He's been eyeing one of these buggers every time we were at electronics section of stores so I finally caved and bought this for him. He really loves it more than his old tablet. Had it for about 7 months or so now and it seems to still work great. Did not slow down like his old tablet. My dad only uses this tablet to read his news and plays his slot machine apps but still heavily used but this tablet can handle it.
customer_reviews.author: BadLamb

customer_reviews.title: Worst tablet I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: Worst tablet I have ever purchased. It will not allow you to transfer very many apps to the sdcard which makes the sdcard virtually useless. Everything allowed to the sdcard was very, very slow to access. I have owned other androids and Apple tablets. This is not easy to operate or intuitive in its set up and operation. I now own a kindle fire. Definitely a much better tablet in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Good Recreational tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I use this tablet for banking, email, social media and simple games. It is great for all of those activities. The processing is somewhat slow so it is not as suitable for business spreadsheets, correspondence or as a student main computter. I use my Kindle to read books but this tablet is light enough and clear enough to use any e-reader app successfully
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Gwaltney

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift to replace faulty TAB 3 which was several years old
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, came preloaded with version 7 operating system which was better than expected. A bit of a learning curve as compared to the older TAB 3. I would recommend this, has many new features that I haven't yet figured out.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected, not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is slow. And I mean, slow. It is a Samsung, you'd expect a little better quality from this brand name. But you get what you pay for... cheap tablet, cheap speed, cheap life. Do yourself the favor and buy the better tablets, this one lacks. Ill be returning it ASAP as I am so very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Leatherwood

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My son saved up his Christmas and Birthday money to buy his first tablet and we know samsung is a good brand. So far, no complaints. He's loving it. We purchased the screen protector and case for it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Good camera, good picture clarity Bad case (too slick) and died after about 7 months of use. New battery wouldn't fix it, either. It wouldn't take a charge. Wasn't heavily used, either. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nuklhed

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Grandson as a Christmas present (he's 7). This tablet is the perfect size for him and he absolutely loves it! He uses it mostly to watch kids YouTube and Netflix as well as Hulu and have not had any issues with it at all. Him being only 7 he's not going to be doing any quantum physics with it so I can't speak on anything like that, bit for the price it's an amazing tablet and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Donal M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tablet and the price is amazing for what you're getting. Probably not the best for gaming, but for media consumption it works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Cote

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working a little over 2 months in.
customer_reviews.text: It has been a fine tablet, but has now suddenly suffered from black screen of death. It's on, but the screen is black. I've tried all solutions I can find online, but nothing works. So now it's a fancy paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: William Brimer

customer_reviews.title: Eveything I need
customer_reviews.text: Ideal size not too big like a 10.1 or too small like a 7.
customer_reviews.author: oldmiser

customer_reviews.title: Super slow
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Samsung products, but, not this one! OMG, this tablet sucks. It's slow and also freezes a lot. It's only 8 months old.
customer_reviews.author: laollis

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was expecting. Love that the number of gigs can be expanded unlike the other big name tablets
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rose

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: This is our forth Galaxy over the years and they always come through, great tab for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: SO FAR, SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Bought Mom the used one last year..(I know better than this) It was wonky actin' when we got it, but thought it was the internet. She mentioned it was still acting funny ( a month later) and I noticed it kept kicking the internet out when I put the info in. (Thank GOD she told me on the last day to return it) Bought this one, the NEW one and so far, so good. Much happier with this one. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kris May

customer_reviews.title: Not much storage
customer_reviews.text: Not enough storage for today's world. I'm always running out and having to delete things. Video is just okay. Can't run other apps while watching a video. The clarity is good though. Great price, but not useful for more than casual usage.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Ok for what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Good tablet but slow for the everyday computer geek (myself) it becomes frustrating waiting for it to catch up with typing, web searching and having multiple windows open....guess I should have spent a lot more for what I was looking for. Overall battery life is good and reading mode lighting is nice and cuts down on the blue light.
customer_reviews.author: H. Gilman

customer_reviews.title: Great size, works very well, advice on case for it
customer_reviews.text: I am replacing a 7" Tab A and I am very happy with this model. The main reason I am writing the review is to advise on finding a case since I had some trouble. None of the ads for Galaxy Tab A 8" cases say whether they fit the new 2019 model T380. Turns out the cases made for 2018 Tab A do not fit the 2019, but the 2017 cases and screen protectors do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Moved to the 21st century
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is simply wonderful. It has made my life so much better and I'm able to access technology with the rest of the world. It is lightweight and fits in my purse beautifully. I carry it everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: 3Pete9

customer_reviews.text: I ordered two and one works great the second one freezes since the first day we got it. I bought them for my kids and didnt pay much attention to it because I thought it would be fixed if i reset it but it works when it wants too
customer_reviews.author: Rubi Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I don’t recommend. The screen shuts off and on. My son only used it twice. The tablet gets really hot when charging, it doesn’t feel safe.
customer_reviews.author: violeta mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Best tab for your money
customer_reviews.text: Great tab replaced a Samsung 3. Looked up a site that rated 5 best tabs to buy this one was rated best of the best and they were right
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Get you a tablet especially for work or kids!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband use his tablet for work. He loves it if you a iPhone user it takes a few minutes to use the android tablet but easy to use as well. Holds a lot of storage, easy to set up. Saves on battery. Packaged neatly and item as described. Thanks!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beyon'd Beauteeful

customer_reviews.title: It works great. Love the kids mode feature
customer_reviews.text: It works great. Love the kids mode feature. My kids love playing games and watching videos.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: you made a good choice  but you need a sims card for me,ory,
customer_reviews.text: Tablet is just right size to check e mail and Facebook. Tablet has all functions of a big laptop but much easier to carry around and battery last all day.
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: 8.0 Samsung Galaxy Tab A met expectation!
customer_reviews.text: This was given as a Christmas gift to my "great granddaughter" who happens to be 3 years old turning 4 on June 3rd. My granddaughter, her mother programmed the topics/features that she could utilize. She is extremely smart for her age and she loves her Galaxy! Her mother loves it as well, in fact, she recommended that I purchase the 8.0 Samsung Galaxy Tab A.
customer_reviews.author: Venus L. Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Good deal when on sale.
customer_reviews.text: Good deal, battery takes a long time to change and dies relatively quickly compared to a cell phone. I even ran dead and fully charged 3 times for the battery memory.
customer_reviews.author: Suk mihoff

customer_reviews.title: Great little tablet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 14 year old daughter after her using a Kindle for years. She had outgrown the Kindle over the years so upgraded to give her more options of use. So far been great and it's my second one in the house. Previous one still works after years of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Chad L.

customer_reviews.title: On The Fly
customer_reviews.text: I like this tablet. Can use while in transit on metro, unobtrusive size makes it easy to pack in bag. Watch You Tube and do light schoolwork and DuoLingo Language app. Yea!
customer_reviews.author: JOHN DONOHUE

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and frustrated
customer_reviews.text: Screen stopped work 2 months after purchase. Asurion warranty no help. Stuck with a broken tablet and out $200.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Culpepper

customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time exactly as described. Defective battery to over 2 hours to get charged to only 54% & could not charge any higher. Once I started using the tab the battery was used up in less than 30 minutes. That's a joke!! Returned immediately. I brought used may be buying new would make a difference
customer_reviews.author: Pitchy

customer_reviews.title: Prefect Tablet for its size
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Samsung tab a, I really enjoy this tablet over any others because it is easy to use has a great battery life and great value for what you are paying grated this specific model is 5 yrs old because it came out in 2015. It's reliable and still able to keep up with newer models that are currently available now.
customer_reviews.author: NoBodyHere

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Does everything it says it would. Works and runs great! Bought two of these and with prime's next day delivery, it was delivered on time! Boys couldn't' wait to receive the item. Would definitely buy again, maybe one more myself!
customer_reviews.author: Azurite

customer_reviews.title: I can see it just fine under the Bimini top
customer_reviews.text: I use for navigation on the sailboat. I can see it just fine under the Bimini top. I placed it in a hardened case with a screen cover...works great!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: SLOW SLOW SLOW
customer_reviews.text: How loudly can I yell from the rooftops....piece of crap! SLOW. Locks up. Unresponsive screen. Perhaps I have a lemon unit, and it's too late to return this waste of money. I spend more time being frustrated, that actually using it.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Affordable for a new tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Nice tablet. I got the platinum. Its prettier than I thought it would be. I've owned a lot of samsung tablets. Samsung has never disappointed me. The tablet delivered quickly. Very happy with Amazon also.
customer_reviews.author: Pam W.

customer_reviews.title: Charger doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Charger doesn’t work. Very bad charger. Tablet is working fine but they sent poor quality charger. I can’t recommend this seller for further more product.
customer_reviews.author: Khem N.

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I really like the tablet but the battery life is horrible. Takes all night to charge and 3 hours to run it out. I wouldn't recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: chuckd206

customer_reviews.title: The worst!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after two weeks. Waste of money. Will not play games, connect to facebook and continuously times out. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: lisad

customer_reviews.title: A good product
customer_reviews.text: This was an emergency tablet for my self. It is good. No problems at all. I use it to check things from work. So far no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Tomoyasu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tablet. Just as described in video's I watched ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tablet. Just as described in video's I watched about it. Does everything I need it to do and more. Great value I am happy for sure...
customer_reviews.author: Alan P. Manfredi

customer_reviews.title: Its twice as fast as my older one!
customer_reviews.text: I needed this to replace one that was damaged beyond repair. It arrived nicely packaged and on time. Operates the exact same as my older model but faster.
customer_reviews.author: Noladeb

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet it's light weight suitable size and very fun to use, would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Renia Aimable

customer_reviews.title: I'd give it an 8
customer_reviews.text: I love the light weight of the tablet. The display is bright, clear and the colors are wonderful. You can play games, Facebook, email all things I do daily. The battery life is not as long as I hoped it would be. The close and back buttons are not lit and are hard to find even in the daylight.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara R.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson and granddaughter enjoy the Samsung Galaxy Tab A 8.0" . So It is still working great. Thanks for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 2 kids. For their purposes it’s great. I only put 4 for ease because I’m not use to Android. My electronics are Apple. They’ve been able to download more apps than their last tablet. Came with parental controls too which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient to use.
customer_reviews.text: Battery life lasts a long time. Just small enough to put in a medium size bag or purse.
customer_reviews.author: Liana K.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It’s great. Clear picture great gigs and sound amazing price
customer_reviews.author: Everything Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for the price
customer_reviews.text: This product worked really well kids love it long battery life and durable. Also can watch movies and internet use no need to get anything more expensive. If you’re looking for internet use, Netflix and something for the kids to use to be quiet for a while this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Clement Rivers

customer_reviews.title: This tablet is likely one of the best buys I have ever made
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is likely one of the best buys I have ever made. It came right on time and works very good, fast and adequate memory for what I need. Very easy to setup!
customer_reviews.author: Harley Guy

customer_reviews.title: must buy
customer_reviews.text: boss tablet for the price and model. no complaints yet. love it
customer_reviews.author: JARED C PAVLAK

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the tablet, very secure and fast shipping. I would buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Lords

customer_reviews.title: nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: just right wife loved it not to big easy to use saves battery on her cell phone for when shes out thank you
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.text: everything arrived well, in perfect condition and at the agreed time, equal to the description. I recommend that you buy it. I am very happy with the product!!!!!!😊👍
customer_reviews.author: Mariela V.

customer_reviews.title: Can't say right now
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my wife - X Mass Shhh its a secret
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Samsung tablets rocks!!
customer_reviews.text: The tablet was for my sister, she's loves the size and tablet no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Artisha Parks

customer_reviews.title: I love this tablet a lot
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet a lot!! Is is very fast and the battery last a lot longer then the last tablet I had and the pictures comes in so clear!! Very nice tablet!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: My daughter enjoyed her Christmas present. She's always on it.
customer_reviews.author: LaToya D. Williams-Bracey

customer_reviews.title: Blazing Fast!
customer_reviews.text: Had a kindle before this the Tab A. The Tab A blows the Kindle away. It is so fast! No regrets with this one!
customer_reviews.author: DRC

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the Irulu that I purchased on EBay that ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this tablet for a month or so but It works well. Much better than the Irulu that I purchased on EBay that had to be returned and money refunded to me.
customer_reviews.author: Tazwalker

customer_reviews.title: Old model!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize but this is a 2015 model! It’s 2019! Camera is outdated as well.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a friend I have one too like very much
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Beware....
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is 2 months old and it just stopped working ..... nothing at all ..... just stopped working out of the blue
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy these again!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase so far!Wife loves it! Easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for my brother. He absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Samsung tablet I've bought. THis is 8 in instead of 10 but still love the ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Packard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tablet is awesome my son is having a good using it.
customer_reviews.author: Batchelor

customer_reviews.title: I cannot use my tablet due to forgotten password
customer_reviews.text: I need help with this tablet! I have not been able to reset to factory's setting because I have forgotten password! I have not used this tablet because of this problem 😡 Please advise!
customer_reviews.author: J. Adkinson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping works great and best of all I got a great deal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to my Mom that turns 79! she likes it and understand the device OK

customer_reviews.title: Wife likes it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife. She likes it. She has an Samsung Galaxy phone so this was real easy for her to use.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful color and performance
customer_reviews.text: This tab has a very good performance and easy to use with a beautiful look.

customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use, I like the storage capacity

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice screen, easy to use I have good luck with Samsung products.

customer_reviews.title: Like my tablet
customer_reviews.text: I use it all the time and it works well. Samsung are good products.

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife happy happy life .
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it . You can receive calls with it when you have your phone rigged up properly with it . Using a Android phone .

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was a present and the reviews are good. No issues, works appropriately

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot love this enough!!! Very fast, love the color, works great.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! Wish i knew a little more about GB and all .. wish it had a lil more storage..

customer_reviews.title: BUY It NOW
customer_reviews.text: A mighty giant, best investment I ever made, quality and ease of use with GOGGLE FAR exceed my two previous IPads. Buy it and enjoy!

customer_reviews.title: The good delivery in good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a refurbish items, the seller do give a brand new look and feel like a new unit. Love it and will come to buy again

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the carrying case but the tablet works very well.

customer_reviews.text: This item is EXTREMELY slow!..had one previously and thought it was a great product, this one not so much...very disappointing..

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for my husband as a Christmas gift. He really likes it.

customer_reviews.title: Our Samsung devices have been very reliable, so far...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son since my wife enjoys hers. So far everyone is happy.

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet  wish it had stock android on it !!
customer_reviews.text: Great Tablet wish it had stock android on it !!

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Perfect condition, Daughter loves it, very responsive. Nice screen. Updated to 7.1.1. Out of box nice.

customer_reviews.title: It came the next day and was perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my granddaughter. It was easy to get it all set up and she loved everything about it.

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: Great for children and for beginners. Love this product. It has all the apps and compatible with most of them that you need in ur daily life. Great purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for a good price and qaulity!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Samsung tablet!!! I always bought it before and I will buy it again!!! Great product, and company too!!!!

customer_reviews.title: They keep getting better
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Seems to handle everything with ease. Awsome battery life. I especially like the "close all apps" buuton on lower left. I use that all the time saving battery life. Can go two or three days between charges.

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: I like that its a carry with me and has all of he features of a big computer.
customer_reviews.author: Kim A. Russell

customer_reviews.title: The screen is a good size and the price was reasonable
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my boyfriend and he likes it. The screen is a good size and the price was reasonable, in my opinion. I used it for a short while and it serves its purpose. He and I are happy with the tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel L.

customer_reviews.title: It’s not working
customer_reviews.text: The tablet is not working it keeps blinking After a couple months to start acting up

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab A 8.0" 16GB Smoky Titanium - SM-T350NZAAXAR
product_meta.description: Keep All Your Samsung Devices In Sync. With Samsung SideSync 3.0 and Quick Connect, you can share content and work effortlessly between your Samsung tablet, smartphone and personal computer. Capture More Real-Time Moments. With enhanced front and rear cameras on the Galaxy Tab A, you’ll never miss another shareable moment. Catch all the action with the continuous shot setting. Switch quickly between camera and video modes. And make every picture better with autofocus.
feature_bullets: Android 5.0 Lollipop, 8 inch Display; Product Dimensions (inches) 8.20 inch x 5.43 inch x 0.29 inch
16 GB Flash Memory, 1.5 GB RAM Memory
MicroSD Card Slot (Up to 128GB), Display Resolution: 1024 x 768 XGA
Camera 5MP rear + 2MP front, 4x Digital Zoom, Wi-Fi: 802.11 a/b/g/n, dual-band (2.4GHz + 5GHz)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars607 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
